head.title: Walk-Ons That Might Steal the Show

hedline.hl1: Walk-Ons That Might Steal the Show

abstract.p: Orbo, Brooklyn-based company, offers vibrant hand-painted rugs and runners of varnished cotton canvas; photos (Currents column) (S)

block.p: Kristin Ordahl (on left at right) is a painter and video artist. Kelly Bortoluzzi (right) designs furniture. Together they are Orbo, a Brooklyn-based company, which makes vibrant hand-painted rugs and runners of varnished cotton canvas. They have been influenced by the minimalist painter Agnes Martin, by early Marimekko fabrics and by mattress ticking. A Calavita 32 (above right, 32 inches square) is $328; a Bandana 71 (above, 26 by 68 inches) is $782 at www.orbodesign.com; delivery in six to eight weeks.
